name: Reality
description:
The first collector of this NFT will receive this original painting. 1st collector, please DM me via Twitter @Maks_Denysenko

Reality
The ego is the knot in your heart that separates the mind from the true self. When the knot is untied, then the ego and the mind rush into the heart. They both sink into the heart center, which is the true self, and you become liberated. So look at yourself honestly. Study your thoughts. It is your thoughts that bring you problems and troubles. You believed that thoughts are necessary, that you must have thoughts, otherwise you will not be able to exist, you will not be able to function. Quite the opposite: when your thoughts are surpassed and transformed, then pure awareness, absolute reality takes over.
Quote by Bhagavan Maharshi

Artwork created by Maksym Denysenko in 2020, 70x50 cm, spray paint on canvas, 7931x11185 pix.
